attributes.action: give gifted people a chance in government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'd suggest that 
a) a new minister is appointed to ensure that appropriate decisions are made by government authorities.  
b) 'gifted' children/persons be invited to assist in making decisions

rejection.details: We are unclear what you mean by 'gifted'.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
